snippet: With two perfect runs on Monday in her first race since tearing a knee ligament in December, the American Mikaela Shiffrin won a women’s World Cup slalom in Crans-Montana, Switzerland.
abstract: United States skier Mikaela Shiffrin wins women's World Cup slalom in Crans-Montana, Switzerland, her first race since suffering knee ligament tear.
lead_paragraph: With two perfect runs on Monday in her first race since tearing a knee ligament in December, the American Mikaela Shiffrin won a women’s World Cup slalom in Crans-Montana, Switzerland.
